data.title: UNDP Ghana on LinkedIn: #futuresmartghana
data.meta_description:
Time to bond, revitalize, & restrategize.

Our 2023 retreat is offering us the opportunity to bond & innovate to deliver on our shared vision towards a‚Ä¶
data.text:
We had an amazing time connecting with listeners on Ho FM in Ho üá¨üá≠ today! Our radio phone-in session was filled with facts & insightful discussions on energy efficiency. Thanks to listeners and callers who participated in our quiz. Congratulations to our winners üéäüéä Stay tuned for our next stop & remember: #NoLabel, #NoGood

The town hall meeting series continues TODAY in Ho! We're discussing the crucial role of #EnergyEfficiency in promoting a nature-positive impact. Our collaboration with Ministry of Environment, Science, Technology and Innovation & Energy Commission of üá¨üá≠ aims to deepen public & institutional awareness of the new #EnergyEfficiency & conservation regulations, engaging local stakeholders and community members to ensure a sustainable future. #Climatepromise

We are back with the 2nd edition of our #NimdieSeries This edition is hotter & promises to be very educative. If you are an #MSME, join us on 31/07/24 at 9:30 AM GMT to learn more on how to position your business for opportunities under the #OneAfricaMarket. Register‚û° https://bit.ly/3WBk0LV

1 day to Go! Team #Sunyani, get ready for our next Young Africa Innovates bootcamp. It promises to be exciting, educative and solution oriented for young #innovators. #YAI #SunCityGh #YouthInnovation

Congratulations to our winners üéâ Today, we took our energy efficiency campaign to Yess FM in Cape Coast. We engaged with listeners, shared insights on Ghana‚Äôs new regulations & rewarded participants with energy-efficient appliances. Remember, #NoLabel, #NoGood

Great time to engage with Spring Impact team in #Ghana this week. Their visit is timely as we focus on the acceleration of UNDP‚Äôs Young Africa Innovates programme. We shared progress updates and next steps on the #YAI programme.

Congratulations to the listeners of Skyy Power FM in Takoradi, one of 14 stations participating in our Q&A phone-in session aimed at reaching the citizenry. We educated and engaged listeners through these sessions, incentivizing those who provided accurate responses with energy-efficient appliances. Remember #NoLabel, #NoGood

Energy efficiency at scale is critical in promoting nature-positive environmental impact. We're hosting townhall meetings & radio programs with Ministry of Environment, Science, Technology and Innovation & Energy Commission of Ghana to deepen public & institutional awareness on the new energy efficiency & conservation regulations. #Climatepromise

Our 2nd Quarter Newsletter is live!! We're excited to share our progress and the impactful initiatives we've undertaken together with our partners to advance the #SDGs attainment in #Ghana to ensure no one is left behind. Read more ‚û°Ô∏èhttps://bit.ly/4d3SX2g

We seek proposals from NGOs to support the implementation of activities to enhance the socio-economic livelihoods of women and youth in the Northern Region of Ghana & improve social cohesion for community development and empowerment. Click‚û°Ô∏èhttps://bit.ly/3Ls39pk for more details
